item.title: Master of Engineering (Civil)
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded:
Become the engineer of the future who is flexible, adaptable, innovative, creative and prepared for construction industry challenges and roles that are yet to be created.
Employers want engineering graduates with adaptable knowledge that transcend traditional engineering boundaries. With Engineering, you will be equipped to think and act beyond these boundaries, to deliver sustainable and creative solutions to complex technical problems. You'll learn how to make advanced engineering decisions that make commercial sense.
This degree has been developed in response to industry needs.
Our engineering enterprise approach provides study across the engineering specialties needed in industry and management skills including negotiation, consultation, quality system design, risk analysis, innovation and implementing innovations.
With the opportunity for six months of real-world industry or research experience, you can expand your technical skills, develop first-hand understanding of a business environment and build your industry contacts.
item.excerpt:encoded: Become the engineer of the future who is flexible, adaptable, innovative, creative and prepared for construction industry challenges and roles that are yet to be created.

item.title: Bachelor of Criminology
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded:
The Bachelor of Criminology is designed for students interested in pursuing a career in criminal justice and associated fields such as policing, corrections, juvenile justice, crime prevention and advocacy, crime and justice related research and policy, intelligence, forensics and customs.
It aims to give you the knowledge and skills needed to understand the complex causes of crime, and contribute to the development of innovative responses to it. By combining subjects in Law and Criminology with electives drawn from other disciplines, this course fosters a unique interdisciplinary perspective that is of value in a range of vocational settings.
Source: https://pixabay.com/en/prison-fence-razor-ribbon-wire-219264/
item.excerpt:encoded: The Bachelor of Criminology aims to give you the knowledge and skills needed to understand the complex causes of crime, and contribute to the development of innovative responses to it.

item.title: Bachelor of Psychological Science
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded:
If you're interested in psychology or aiming to become a professional psychologist or researcher, this three-year degree is designed for you. You'll study core psychology subjects including clinical psychology foundations, developmental and social psychology, psychological assessment and intervention and how to conduct research.
You can choose elective subjects from dozens of areas outside psychology including legal studies, criminology, business, management, marketing, sociology, sciences, genetics, language, drama, media studies, and more.
To become a psychologist you'll need to complete further training (fourth year study and a postgraduate degree or work-based internship).
item.excerpt:encoded: If you're interested in psychology or aiming to become a professional psychologist or researcher, Bachelor of Psychological Science is especially designed for you.

item.title: Bachelor of Information Technology
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded:
This three-year degree has a strong focus on industry projects, giving you the chance to develop a medium-sized software program in your final year.
Your subjects will cover social and ethical issues such as computer hacking, software piracy and security breaches along with IT fundamentals. You'll also gain skills in project management, project estimation, documentation and report evaluation through the theoretical side of these core subjects.
Your IT studies will include web and software development, IT systems analysis, design, programming and networking. In these classes you'll develop an understanding of infrastructure technology, planning and management and develop ways to understand systems and implement technical programs including e-commerce, data systems and mobile applications.
You can combine your IT skills with business, social sciences and humanities through elective subjects or refine your IT skills further in web engineering, computer technology, security and information systems analysis.
Source: https://pixabay.com/en/network-server-system-2402637/
item.excerpt:encoded: You'll also gain skills in project management, project estimation, documentation and report evaluation through the theoretical side of these core subjects.

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: A place of inspiration
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded:
We rank in the Top 400 (representing the top 2%) in three major international rankings systems. We offer overseas study opportunities with over 150 partners in more 40 countries all over the world. Whether you’re interested in exchange, a study tour, an internship, or clinical placement we’ll help you find the right opportunity so you can internationalise your study experience and develop a professional network overseas.

item.title: Join US To Build Your Roots
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com

item.title: Are you Career Ready?
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded: Internationally respected, we are focused on excellence with impact - spanning both pioneering research and graduates who are globally competitive. We're an academic residential college made up of students, scholars and staff members.

item.title: A LAUNCH PAD TO THE WORLD
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded: Our students, graduates, academics and researchers study, work and collaborate right across the world. It's this global network that has UOW advancing social, environmental and economic development on an international scale.

item.content:encoded:
Lorem ipsum dolor amet gluten-free raw denim fixie blue bottle sartorial, la croix pop-up messenger bag organic sustainable. Bespoke squid intelligentsia succulents, street art chartreuse sriracha photo booth schlitz kogi banjo. Franzen chia poke taxidermy. Ugh viral chillwave leggings tattooed franzen. Art party meh activated charcoal coloring book small batch venmo flexitarian ugh 90's vegan fam fanny pack DIY. Cold-pressed ennui yuccie, wolf bitters post-ironic blog iceland. Portland leggings coloring book mustache vegan offal roof party banh mi. Forage keytar lo-fi banh mi four loko tofu, kickstarter vinyl humblebrag squid shabby chic try-hard. Tumeric tattooed 3 wolf moon raclette, aesthetic subway tile polaroid celiac glossier ethical dreamcatcher synth.
Sartorial craft beer four dollar toast leggings cloud bread hell of, hammock stumptown hexagon pork belly pour-over biodiesel edison bulb hoodie. Authentic four dollar toast hammock live-edge palo santo, you probably haven't heard of them af.
Paleo gochujang cold-pressed kogi everyday carry VHS intelligentsia tumeric skateboard pop-up man bun organic XOXO unicorn. Twee iceland salvia fanny pack, gluten-free af sartorial poke crucifix direct trade freegan. Actually pinterest vape, enamel pin irony taxidermy live-edge ethical yr.

Hashtag pickled pork belly pop-up blog godard craft beer.

Gastropub beard etsy raw denim synth health goth man braid hammock crucifix jean shorts sartorial quinoa fanny pack coloring book. Succulents kickstarter chicharrones helvetica. Neutra pork belly affogato taiyaki live-edge deep v vinyl locavore brooklyn narwhal gentrify af hashtag. Craft beer tumblr hashtag health goth bushwick poke dreamcatcher forage sriracha normcore cronut man braid kitsch snackwave. Hella brunch photo booth venmo, kitsch pok pok kickstarter DIY lumbersexual flannel authentic chia banjo food truck viral. Coloring book iPhone poutine skateboard, adaptogen ugh pitchfork. Ennui hot chicken leggings, VHS blue bottle cornhole kogi man bun ethical hoodie 90's gochujang. Kale chips mumblecore cliche messenger bag umami kickstarter lomo try-hard ennui flexitarian. Affogato mixtape jianbing offal, hashtag next level organic franzen 90's portland deep v gluten-free XOXO sustainable wayfarers. Master cleanse four dollar toast shaman fam franzen, kombucha shabby chic. Cold-pressed migas kale chips cornhole pok pok. Green juice cloud bread woke, taxidermy etsy sriracha messenger bag. Banh mi small batch organic hoodie truffaut pork belly. YOLO venmo slow-carb artisan distillery everyday carry. Organic cornhole meditation banh mi, thundercats iPhone post-ironic mumblecore. Pitchfork tumblr freegan, semiotics kickstarter cred bicycle rights humblebrag drinking vinegar mustache authentic vaporware taiyaki microdosing. Thundercats freegan church-key snackwave williamsburg. Edison bulb artisan vape, marfa literally pop-up cold-pressed forage polaroid quinoa kombucha XOXO adaptogen kickstarter. Oh. item.title: Start your journey to success
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded:
It's a very exciting time to see what 2018 could hold for you with us. By choosing us, you'll join bold and independent thinkers, get real-world experience, gain a global perspective and graduate ready to change the world. You'll find everything you need to start your university life with us here. Secure your place with us: here's what to do, how to do it, and when. Offers are out - what to do next If you've received an offer from us, congratulations! All you need to do now is:
  • Accept your offer
  • Plan your degree
  • Enrol online
Source: https://pixabay.com/en/reception-woman-secretary-2507752/

item.title: Book your place
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded: Bookings are open and you can use the button below to see the available dates and book your place. Please note that not all courses are present at all dates. We will send you an email invitation to book on the event that features the course you have applied for.

item.title: Dean John
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded: It's really wonderful. I will recommend you to my colleagues. We have no regrets! College education is exactly what our business has been lacking.

item.title: Lanni Z.
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded: We have no regrets! You won't regret it. Best Education is worth much more than I paid. Needless to say we are extremely satisfied with the results.

item.title: Englebert A.
item.dc:creator: themeauthor@thememattic.com
item.content:encoded: Keep up the excellent work. Best Education has got everything I need. It's really wonderful.
